rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能在审阅科学论文方面能否超越人类专家？人工智能驱动的模型与专家相匹配，为科学手稿提供富有洞察力的反馈，在评估研究质量和潜力方面证明同样有效，甚至更有效。该工具基于 GPT-4 架构，有效简化了同行评审流程，提供了许多研究人员认为有价值且有意重用的定制建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Can-AI-outshine- human-experts-in-reviewing-scientific-papers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Can-AI-outshine- human-experts-in-reviewing-scientific-papers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9625090-b473-4b65-bf29-ce5e533ecf6c Mon, 09 Oct 2023 00:11:00 -0400 Can AI outshine human experts in reviewing scientific papers?
生成式人工智能是急诊室快速准确解读胸片的未来吗？研究人员开发了一种用于解读胸部 X 光片的人工智能工具，其准确性和质量与放射科医生报告相当，文本质量优于远程放射学。人工智能快速、准确的分析可以简化急诊科的患者处理流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Is-generative-AI-the-future-of-rapid-and-accurate-chest-radiograph-interpretation-in-the-ER.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Is-generative-AI-the-future-of-rapid-and-accurate-chest-radiograph-interpretation-in-the-ER.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0df5dc6-881d-48f0-ad2e-a2c61f8775bc Sun, 08 Oct 2023 23:52:00 -0400 Is generative AI the future of rapid and accurate chest radiograph interpretation in the ER?
下一代鼻内疫苗一剂可对抗麻疹、腮腺炎和多种 COVID-19 变种研究人员开发了一种鼻内三价麻疹-腮腺炎-SARS-CoV-2 疫苗，可为多种冠状病毒变种提供强大的保护。该疫苗利用已建立的麻疹-腮腺炎-风疹平台，表现出广泛且适应性强的免疫反应，特别是针对 Delta 和 Omicron 变种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Next-gen-intranasal-vaccine-takes-on-measles-mumps-and-multiple-COVID-19-variants-in-one-shot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Next-gen-intranasal-vaccine-takes-on-measles-mumps-and-multiple-COVID-19-variants-in-one-shot.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b335ae9-1140-4a9b-831e-e170e63cfd69 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 23:24:00 -0400 Next-gen intranasal vaccine takes on measles, mumps, and multiple COVID-19 variants in one shot
抗原制图学解码 SARS-CoV-2 变体和疫苗的奥秘研究人员利用抗原制图分析了 SARS-CoV-2 变体的交叉反应模式以及刺突蛋白变化对感染后和疫苗接种免疫反应的影响。该研究阐明了独特的中和特征，并强调了反复免疫过程中不断演变的防御机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Antigenic-cartography-decodes-the-mysteries-of-SARS-CoV-2-variants-and-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Antigenic-cartography-decodes-the-mysteries-of-SARS-CoV-2-variants-and-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7337c81-c1bd-4c42-a822-898516451d74 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 23:08:00 -0400 Antigenic cartography decodes the mysteries of SARS-CoV-2 variants and vaccines
解码扭曲：冠状病毒刺突蛋白揭示其复杂的入侵舞蹈研究人员利用冷冻电镜和分子动力学揭示了人类冠状病毒 HKU1 刺突蛋白与受体结合后的构象变化。研究结果揭示了β冠状病毒附着的复杂性，表明宿主细胞入侵的机制比之前理解的更为复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Decoding-the-twist-Coronavirus-spike- Proteins-reveal-their-intricate-invasion-dance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Decoding-the-twist-Coronavirus-spike- Proteins-reveal-their-intricate-invasion-dance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31d211a1-fa02-4cf7-ae9d-69caddf58e52 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 22:40:00 -0400 Decoding the twist: Coronavirus spike proteins reveal their intricate invasion dance
尽管面临 Omicron 挑战，Novavax 疫苗仍显示出针对症状性 COVID-19 的弹性防御能力最近的研究评估了 NVX-CoV2373 疫苗针对 Omicron 变种的有效性。研究结果显示，四个月后疗效有所下降，但对有症状的 COVID-19 具有稳定的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Novavax-vaccine-shows-resilient-defense-against-symptomatic-COVID-19-despite-Omicron-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Novavax-vaccine-shows-resilient-defense-against-symptomatic-COVID-19-despite-Omicron-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f0303ff-bad9-4085-8180-063f7e4571c7 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 22:32:00 -0400 Novavax vaccine shows resilient defense against symptomatic COVID-19 despite Omicron challenge
利巴韦林和普莱可那利治疗 1 型糖尿病的潜在益处研究人员调查了利巴韦林和普莱康那利是否可以刺激 1 型糖尿病患者的内源性胰岛素产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/The-pottial-benefits-of-ribavirin-and-pleconaril-treatment-on-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/利巴韦林-and-pleconaril-treatment-on-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment的潜在益处https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85383bca-e17e-4c67-ad18-225808ca9436 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 21:12:00 -0400 The potential benefits of ribavirin and pleconaril treatment on type 1 diabetes
COVID-19 的连锁反应：南非结核病诊断受到打击COVID-19 扰乱了南非初级卫生诊所的结核病诊断服务，凸显了对能够应对未来流行病的强大系统的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/COVID-19s-ripple-effect-South-African-TB-diagnostics-take-a-hit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/COVID-19s-ripple-effect-South-African-TB-diagnostics-take-a-hit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72dc01cb-69a2-459b-9395-569b687584c5 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 20:47:00 -0400 COVID-19's ripple effect: South African TB diagnostics take a hit
吸烟会损害精子质量吗？ 《抗氧化剂》杂志上的一项研究表明，吸烟会引发精子细胞的应激反应，从而导致精液质量下降。研究人员发现，吸烟者的精子质量较差，可能是由于精子细胞的应激反应升高所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Does-smoking-tobacco-damage-sperm-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Does-smoking-tobacco-damage-sperm-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a06c0a9c-1a1f-482d-9547-cc4c21f9e962 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 20:22:00 -0400 Does smoking tobacco damage sperm quality?
歧视会助长肥胖吗？研究人员通过检查对食物线索和肠道代谢物的神经反应，发现歧视经历与肥胖风险增加之间存在潜在联系。该研究表明，歧视可能会影响不健康的食物选择，可能会破坏大脑与肠道的联系，并建议将针对大脑的治疗或饮食改变作为潜在的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Can-discrimination-fuel-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Can-discrimination-fuel-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f29c8cef-05c1-4d61-9ed1-ca0f29addd5a Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:59:00 -0400 Can discrimination fuel obesity?
